Jeillo Edwards (23 Septemba 1942, Freetown, Sierra Leone 2 Julaị 2004, London, England) bụ onye Sierra Leone na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ama ama na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ojii na Britain

Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ sitere n'Afrịka ịmụ ihe nkiri na Guildhall School of Music and Drama nke London.  Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ otu n'ime ndị isi ojii mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn UK bụ ː Dixon nke Dock Green, ma mee ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ na telivisọn Britain, redio, ikpo okwu na ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Jeillo Angela Doris Edwards na Freetown, Sierra Leone, otu n'ime ụmụ isii, ọ gara ụlọakwụkwọ Annie Walsh Memorial School.
Ọ kwagara England na ngwụcha afọ 1950 wee gụọ akwụkwọ n'ụlọakwụkwọ Guildhall School of Music and Drama
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ, na-agụ akwụkwọ Bible na chọọchị ya
A maara ya nke ọma maka olu ya pụrụ iche na nkwupụta siri ike
Ọ gosipụtara na BBC World Service for Africa, nke a na-agbasa site na UK
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na United Kingdom, na-apụta na telivishọn, ebe ọ bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ pụtara na telivisọn Britain yana ịbụ onye Afrịka mbụ pụtara na The Bill, redio na n'elu ikpo okwu.

Ọ pụtara na ọrụ cameo n'ọtụtụ mmemme telivishọn na-atọ ọchị na Britain, nke gụnyere The Professionals, The League of Gentlemen, Absolutely Fabulous, Red Dwarf, Black Books, Spaced na Little Britain, nke a haziri ka ọ pụta na usoro nke abụọ tupu ọnwụ ya.
Tinyere ime ihe nkiri ọ bụkwa onye gọvanọ ụlọ akwụkwọ n'otu oge ma nwee ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ a na-akpọ Auntie J's na Brixton.

Na mbido afọ 1970, ọ lụrụ onye Ghana, Edmund Clottey, ha nwere nwa nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke abụọ.
Jeillo Edwards nwụrụ na London mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na otu, ebe ọ na-arịa ọrịa akụrụ dị egwu.
